K12D0367_H0377:329b-31: bha gar ling+ga bcu gnas su //
K12D0367_H0377:329b-32: de la tram yig bsgom par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:329b-33: nyi ma 'dra ba'i gzugs dag yod //
K12D0367_H0377:329b-34: sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o //
K12D0367_H0377:329b-35: bha gar ling+ga bcug nas su //
K12D0367_H0377:329b-36: de la h'um yig bsgom par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:329b-37: h'um mdzad 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-2: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-3: de nyid gsang ba gsang chen yang //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-4: snying po yongs su grags la yin //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-5: snying pos rjes su 'grub pa ni; ;nye ba'i snying por yongs grags so //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las /
K12D0367_H0377:330a-7: gsang ba sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
K12D0367_H0377:330a-8: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dang /
K12D0367_H0377:330a-9: rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rgyud yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:330a-10: kun 'grub zad med bde ba ni //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-11: de ni rdo rje 'grub pa ste //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-12: don yod dam tshig 'da' dka' yin //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-13: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi don yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:330a-14: ji ltar gnas su gang 'khor lo //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-15: de ltar snge dang 'gro ba bzhin //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-16: 'khor dang yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba; ;de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor bskyed mchog yin //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-17: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam smin gyi rgyu yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:330a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' sogs lha yi //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-19: dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthod ba las //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-20: ji 'dra rtag pa'i bsod nams su //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-21: phyi ni de bzhin bri bya'o //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-22: de la ji ltar thig gdab pa'i cho ga shes pa yin zhen /
K12D0367_H0377:330a-23: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bya na //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-24: mtshams kun mnyam por 'dren par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-25: shar dang nub dang byang sogs phyogs //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-26: thig skud bzhi ba re'u mig brgyad //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-27: dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi //
K12D0367_H0377:330a-28: rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-0: rin chen tshul ni rin @330b chen gyi; ;sna tshogs gyi ni zlum por gsungs //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-1: ji ltar 'dod pa ci bde bas //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-2: nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-4: phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-6: re'u mig brgyad kyi dbus gnas pas //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-8: zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-9: de la ji ltar rtog pa'i dngos grub dam pa yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:330b-10: ji ltar bden par dkyil 'khor bdag /
K12D0367_H0377:330b-11: gang gis rtogs par nus pa ni //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-12: gang gis yi dam lhar sbyor pas //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-13: grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ldog pa yin //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-14: bris sku bris pa'i sbyor ba yi //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-15: rang sems bris par sbyor pa yin //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-16: lhag chad cho gar gyur na yang //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-17: bsgrub ste skyon du mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-18: de la ji ltar gsang ba lnga'i de nyid yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:330b-19: sems dpa' dang po gdod ma med //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che; ;kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /
K12D0367_H0377:330b-21: rdo rje snying po gtso ba'i gtso //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-22: gdod ma tha ma med phyir yang //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-23: dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod do //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-24: 'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir ni //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-25: dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug yin; ;de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang lags /
K12D0367_H0377:330b-27: 'dod pa chen po kun gyi mchog /
K12D0367_H0377:330b-29: rtag par 'dzum pa'i bde ba des //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-30: dam pa bcom ldan 'gyur ba yin //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-31: de nas de yi zla mdog ni //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-32: dam pa yig 'bru grub nyid phyir //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-33: chos rnams thams cad dag phyir dang //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-34: gsang ba de nyid rnam dag phyir //
K12D0367_H0377:330b-35: rdo rje 'dzin de zla ba'i mdog /
K12D0367_H0377:331a-2: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'dod chags che //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-3: 'dod chags kun la rjes chags phyir //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyang //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-6: de la ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:331a-7: thod phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan ni //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-8: khams gsum la ni dbu rgyan med //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-9: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ni //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag mngon bskyed //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-11: khams gsum las ni rin chen gzhan //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-12: sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-14: dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin /
K12D0367_H0377:331a-15: de nas ji ltar sems dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:331a-16: yan lag g-yas pas mnyam gnon pas //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-17: g-yon pa'i yan lag gzir nas su //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-18: de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-19: rdo rje snying po gtso yi gtso //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-20: de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo
K12D0367_H0377:331a-21: la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa yin
K12D0367_H0377:331a-22: zhe na / kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-23: dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i mchog /
K12D0367_H0377:331a-24: kun mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-25: thams cad dbang phyug che ru 'phags //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-26: 'grub rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-27: dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo bdag /
K12D0367_H0377:331a-28: rdo rje lha mo tshogs phyag rgya //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin //
K12D0367_H0377:331a-30: de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0367_H0377:331a-31: kyi gsang ba chen po'i de nyid lnga yin zhe
K12D0367_H0377:331b-0: na / me long khrag 'thung zhes bya @331b rnams; ;mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog /
K12D0367_H0377:331b-1: so sor rtog la nyi ma ste //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-2: bya ba la ni rta mchog dang //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-3: chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-4: thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-5: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni; ;'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-6: gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-7: ro dang reg dang de bzhin yang //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-9: de rnams de bzhin nyid kyis bsnyen //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-10: chos kyi dbyings la 'byung ba yis //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-11: rgya cher dngos grub ster bar 'gyur //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-12: zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-13: de nas ji ltar phyag rgya dang /
K12D0367_H0377:331b-14: phyag rgya'i yan lag gi shes pa yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:331b-16: gzung thar ma dang tshe sbyin ma //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-17: nam mkhar 'gro dang lha mo dag /
K12D0367_H0377:331b-18: mkha' 'gro ma drug rab tu grags //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-19: gang gis skra ni bstan 'gyur na //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-20: de la dpral ba bstan par bya; ;mig la ston pa gang yin pa //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-21: de la lte ba bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-22: gang gis lte ba bstan pa na //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-23: de la mthu ni rab tu bstan //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-24: gang gis ma mchu rab bstan na //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-25: de la so ni rab tu bstan //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-26: gang gis lce ni bstan 'gyur na //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-27: de la gsus pa bstan par 'gyur //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-28: gang gis bha ga bstan gyur na //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-29: de la ling+ga bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-30: gang gis rje ngar bstan na //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-31: de la bral ni bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-32: gang gis bral ni bstan gyur na //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-33: de la rkang mthil bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-34: gang gis rkang mthil bstan na ni //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-35: de la sen mo bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-36: gang gis mtshan khung bstan gyur na //
K12D0367_H0377:331b-37: de la smin ma bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-2: de la tsho nge bya ba 'o //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-3: gang gis kha yang bstan na ni //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-4: de la zhags pa bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-5: gang gis gsal shing bstan gyur na //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-6: de la mdung thung bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-7: gang gis san mo bstan na ni //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-8: de la nu ma rab tu bstan //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-9: gang gis khu tshur bstan na ni //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-10: de la mtshams su bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-11: gang gis lce ni bstan gyur na //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-12: de la bshang gcig bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-13: gang gis mi sdug gzugs byed na //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-14: de la mdzes pa'i gzugs bya 'o //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-15: gang gis he skad byed 'gyur na //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-16: de la lag pa bstan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-17: zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-18: de nas ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan ma yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:332a-20: dpral par tri shul de mdung thung //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-21: phyin log mig dang khro gnyer can //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-22: num dag ni mi sdug pa //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-23: sna ni rnam pa gnyis yin te //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-24: gtsug gis bskor ba shes byas te //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-25: ri mo gsum gyis yongs su bskor //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-26: de yi khyim gyi mtshan ma ni //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-27: tri shul chung du me long dang //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-28: ral gri tshul dang rgyal mtshan dang //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-29: rtse gcig khyim gyi mtshan mar bstan //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-32: glo bur mi dga' bya ba dang //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-34: gang pa la yang ral gri 'gyur //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-35: tri sh'u la dang 'dra ba'i tshul //
K12D0367_H0377:332a-36: skad dang bya rog 'dra ba yis //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-0: mtshan nyid de dag dang @332b ldan pa; ;dam pa'i mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-1: zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-2: de la ji ltar thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgyu yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:332b-3: rtogs pa thams cad gsang chen po //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-4: rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas bkug nas de nas bya ba ni //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-5: dril bu rjes su dkrol ba 'o //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-6: de la ji ltar mchod pa chen po thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:332b-7: rtog pa thams cad gsang chen gyi //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-8: gang gis dga' nas mchod pa ni //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-9: rjes su mchod pa dang gzhan yang //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-10: dbyangs dang sil snyan gar gyi yin //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-11: de la ji ltar rang gi rig pa'i lha thams cad sgrub pa chen po'i rgyu yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:332b-12: rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya kun //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-13: g-yo dang mi g-yo 'gyur ba ste //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-14: rang gi yi dam lha sbyor nas //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-15: thams cad de ni 'grub par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-16: de nas ji ltar thams cad rjes su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin zhe na /
K12D0367_H0377:332b-17: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-18: bzlas pa'i dril bu dkrol bar bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-19: rtog pa thams cad rjes grub pas //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-21: de la ji ltar rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan
K12D0367_H0377:332b-22: pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin zhe na
K12D0367_H0377:332b-23: / ao yig thig le dang ldan pa'i //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-24: nub las dang po yang yin te //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-25: shar las dang po bzung nas su //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-26: lci bar ai yig ldan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-27: rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-28: thig le au yig sbyor bar bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-29: lho las dbu ma bzung pa la //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-30: tsheg drag yang dag ldan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-31: the tshom med par de las 'dis //
K12D0367_H0377:332b-32: rjes su sbyor bar ldan par 'gyur //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-2: gnyis pa la ni ldan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-3: nan tan gyis ni ai yig sbyor //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-4: skad cig ma las gcod 'gyur ro //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-5: de nyid thig le dang ldan bas //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-6: byang las dbu ma yang yin te //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-7: de nyid lan gnyis brjod par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-8: rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-9: thig le au yig ldan par ni //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-10: drug par yongs su grags pa yin //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-11: dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa; ;nub las dang po yang yin te //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-12: de ni aa med shes bya ste //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-13: skad cig mas ni bdud rtsi 'grub //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-14: ao yig thig le dang ldan par //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-15: yi ge au yig mnyam ldan ba'i //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-16: dbang ldan phyi rol pa yang bya //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-17: me mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-18: yi ge ae dang mnyam ldan pa //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-19: shar gyi dang po ldan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-20: tsheg drag au yig ldan pa yi //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-21: dbus kyi tha ma ldan par bya //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-22: thams cad kyi ni sgrub byed pa //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-25: de nas phyi na ci 'dod par //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-27: kun bzang kun byed de bzhin te //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-30: bzhad pa dang ni smra ba la //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-31: gang dang de ru ci de bzhin //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-32: gang dang dbang po'i las nyid pas //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-33: gang gang de de'i rang bzhin du; ;rang gi mnyam gzhag med sbyor bas //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-34: rang gi rig pa'i lha 'dren no //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-35: de nyid sbyor ba de yis ni //
K12D0367_H0377:333a-37: sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-0: rtag tu mthong @333b na rab tu 'grub //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-1: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-2: mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog /
K12D0367_H0377:333b-3: de ni nyes pa rnam grol te //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-4: dngos grub thams cad dbang phyug 'gyur //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'
K12D0367_H0377:333b-6: 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las rjes su
K12D0367_H0377:333b-7: sbyor ba dang ldan pa sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste
K12D0367_H0377:333b-9: de ltar sna tshogs rjes su chags pa'o /
K12D0367_H0377:333b-10: dga' ba padma rnam dag che ba yis //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-11: gsal bar rjes su gtsang ba dam pa rtag par sbyin pa yis /
K12D0367_H0377:333b-12: dam pa bde ba'i dngos pos dam tshig bdag la bde ba rjes su sgrub //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-13: dam pa'i dga' ba shin tu sbyor ba skal bzang dam pa shin tu dga'//
K12D0367_H0377:333b-14: rang bzhin gyis ni rang bzhin dag pa rtag tu rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin dngos //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-15: dam pa dga' ba la sogs sbyor ba'i skal bzang
K12D0367_H0377:333b-16: dam pa shin tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'grub pa
K12D0367_H0377:333b-17: 'o // dag pa rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin
K12D0367_H0377:333b-18: kho na so so rjes su grub pa bde ba
K12D0367_H0377:333b-19: 'o // las / dam pa'i gsang chen rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12D0367_H0377:333b-20: bdag gi 'di ni dang ba'i snying po mchog /
K12D0367_H0377:333b-21: bde ba chen po mchog gi mchog 'gyur mthu chen po //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-22: kun mchog 'byung ba'i sems can rtag pa ci yi phyir //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-23: kun mchog sa yi dbang po nyid ni sbyor ba
K12D0367_H0377:333b-24: po; ;mtha' yas thob med thogs pa med pa'i phyir
K12D0367_H0377:333b-25: // tshul chen po yi chen po thams cad kyi //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-26: mkha' dang 'dra ba'i mchog gi dngos grub 'phel ba sbyin //
K12D0367_H0377:333b-27: ga dod ma tha ma med gang gis //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-1: byed med pa nus ma yin //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-2: sems can le lo can dang nyung tsam 'dod pa dang //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-3: mi dad pa dang lkog smra ba dang ma dag pa //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-4: rta tu rjes su chags dang chags bral dga' ba dang //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-5: de rnams phan pa'i don rdzogs pa'i don 'di yin no //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-6: gang gi khyim du bzung ba gang gis gyur pa dang //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-7: bdag gis ji ltar ston pa sgrub par byed ba'am //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-8: mthu yis thams cad so sor mngon du gyur pa ste //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-9: dngos grub mchog gis rgyus pa'i las dag mi 'grub pa 'o //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-10: gang gis grub pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes sogs pa dang //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-11: gzugs sogs thams cad 'di la ji ltar mos pa bzhin //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-12: yi ge h'um yang ji ltar rab tu 'dod par bris byas na //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-13: des ni 'dod pa dngos grub cho ga bzhin du 'thob //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-14: sems can don du las dag byed pa ma yin pas //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-15: rgyal ba dag gis rnam par dag 'di la //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-16: bgegs med de bzhin bdud kyang med pa ste //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-17: rtog pa yis kyang dngos grub 'phel stobs byin gyis rlobs //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-18: gang gi rtog pa mchog chen 'di sgrub byed pa
K12D0367_H0377:334a-19: la; ;bdud nyid du ni mi 'gro mi brtan nyid
K12D0367_H0377:334a-20: kyang min // brtan pa'i rgyu ni bdag gis ston par mi byed de //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-21: myur bar mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub phyir bstan par 'gyur byed do //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-22: gang gis bdag gi snying pos bdag la rtag tu grub byed ni //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-23: mchog chen dngos grub dang ni rtag par bde chen dang //
K12D0367_H0377:334a-24: chags dang shin tu dga' dang brtan dang rgyas pa dang //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-0: yig chen yang ni rtag @334b par bdag gis 'grub par byed //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-1: de nas mchog skyes rgyal ba thams cad dga' nas su //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-2: 'dzum pa chen jo thams cad khyab par rnam par 'byed //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-3: kun bdag dbyings kyi rdul phra mchog chen gzugs dag gis //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-4: kun nas de la legs pa'i sgra ni dbul bar byed //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-5: bdag gis dbyings kun rjes su che mchog gzugs kyis su //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-6: phan mchog gyur pa sangs rgyas kun gyis legs se
K12D0367_H0377:334b-7: legs; ;mchog gi rdo rje las byung khyod ni legs
K12D0367_H0377:334b-8: so legs // dam pa'i chos nyid chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-9: dam pa'i las can mchod pa'i bdag nyid legs so legs //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-10: rtogs pa'i byin rlabs mdzod cig mnyam par byin rlabs kyis //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-11: don yod dngos grub rtag tu yig 'bru chen po yi //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-12: grub pas phyi na mi 'dul ba yi dus su ni //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-13: de dag gi yang ji ltar dam pa'i bder 'gyur phyir //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-14: de ltar ngag chen zhus nas su //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-15: sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-17: gsungs pa la ni mngon par bstod //
K12D0367_H0377:334b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par spyor ba'i mkha'
K12D0367_H0377:334b-19: 'gro ma sgyu ma bde pa'i mchog ces bya ba
K12D0367_H0377:334b-21: rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brgya bcu bdun pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0367_H0377:334b-22: rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dzny'a na kirti nyid kyis bsgyur /
